plot outline: Devru is a happy go lucky guy who lives in Bengaluru. He falls for Jaanu, the new girl in his colony who he helps get a house. He thinks that Jaanu and he will have their perfect ending, but there is a dark past to Jaanu that he has no idea about.
title: Naanu L/O Jaanu
plot: Devru is a happy go lucky guy who lives in Bengaluru. He falls for Jaanu, the new girl in his colony who he helps get a house. He thinks that Jaanu and he will have their perfect ending, but there is a dark past to Jaanu that he has no idea about.::Sunayana Suresh
